title: Hotel / restaurant industry : percentage of female employees by region 2010
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories for the x axis representing Country, and a y axis representing Female employees.
The highest category is found at Latin_America where Female employees is 58.5.
The lowest category is found at Asia where Female employees is 35.4.
gold: This graph shows the percentage of female employees in the hotel and restaurant industry in 2010 . Latin America has 58.5 percent female employees .
